properties.name: target
properties.description: DOM element or CSS selector string. Element, next to which, a help should be opened (usually the element that triggers open)

properties.name: position
properties.description: String. Where help should be placed relatively to the target. Formated as 'primaryAlignment-secondaryAlignment'.

properties.name: just-fade-in
properties.description: Change the enter animation to just fade in

properties.name: just-fade-out
properties.description: Change the leave animation to just fade out

properties.name: mouseoutClose
properties.description: Allow to close help on mouseout event

properties.name: leftOffset
properties.description: Left offset of component in px from pre-rendered position that depend on 'position' props

properties.name: topOffset
properties.description: Top offset of component in px from pre-rendered position that depend on 'position' props
